title: Jeremy Kyle goes face-to-face with 'worst human being in the world' in backstage argument with foul-mouthed grandmother
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Jeremy Kyle took on one of his fiercest guests yet as he went face-to-face with a foul-mouthed grandmother he called "the worst human being in the world". 
The host locked horns with 60-year-old Joan after her grandaughter Tasmin came on the show to build their relationship. 
Tasmin's mum Tanya appeared on a previous show and accused her mum Joan of abandoning her on national TV. 
Tanya turned her back on her "vile tramp" mother four years ago and did nor return to today's show to see "the worst human being in the world". Read More Joan went straight for Jeremy as she stormed on stage (Photo: ITV) She said she wished her daughter was dead (Photo: ITV) 
Joan, who said she wished her daughter was dead, stormed on stage and went straight for host Jeremy. 
The grandmother said: "Before I say anything I need an apology off of you for last time. 
"I need an apology because you disrespected me." Jeremy went face-to-face with foul-mouthed Joan (Photo: ITV) She accused Jeremy of disrespecting her on a previous show (Photo: ITV) 
She then ran off backstage with the host in hot pursuit, as she claimed the show couldn't continue without her. 
Jeremy said: "I don't need you to do the Jeremy Kyle show." 
Joan replied: "I don't need you to talk to me then so you can shove it." Read More Jeremy Kyle viewers call for 'another referendum' after Scottish guests storm around the studio Tasmin was on the show to build a bond with her grandmother (Photo: ITV) 
Jeremy confronted the battleaxe after she refused to take a lie detector on the last show and accused her of stealing the money. 
It has been revealed that since the show Joan and Tasmin have been in regular contact and are now having a relationship. 
Viewers took to Twitter to air their outrage at the rude grandmother. Jeremy was left stunned by the gobby Grandma (Photo: ITV) 
One viewer said: "#jeremykyle oh wow this woman is a disgrace clearly this person can't handle the truth" 
Another added: "Disrespecting her. Don't sound like she deserves any. #JeremyKyle" 
A third said: "#jeremykyle is outstanding once again. Wished her own daughter dead? What a classy lady #not" Like us on Facebook
